array.name: on_boarding
array.item: Hi there, and welcome to Teammate! tap "Next" to continue onboarding or swipe to dismiss.
The navbar is your primary mode of navigation. Swipe up or long press on it for more options.
The navbar also contains your current team in focus. You can switch teams at anytime from navbar or in context menus on various screens.
That\'s it! Hope you enjoy using Teammate!
